com.aevi.helpers

Class HexUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aevi.helpers.HexUtils

  • public final class HexUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper methods to convert a byte array into readable hexadecimal string.

                             int beginIndex,
                             int endIndex)
        Converts the contents of byte buffer into readable string of hexadecimal numbers.
        Parameters:
        buffer - The buffer to convert.
        beginIndex - The index of the first byte to convert.
        endIndex - The index after the last byte to convert.

      • hexStrToBytes

        public static byte[] hexStrToBytes(java.lang.String s)
        Convert a string of hexadecimal numbers into an encoded byte array.
        Parameters:
        s - A list of two digit decimal numbers separated by a single space that is to be encoded.
        Returns:
        the encoded byte array.

      • isPrintableByte

        public static boolean isPrintableByte(byte b)
        Determines if a byte is a printable ascii char.
        Parameters:
        b - the byte to be tested.
        Returns:
        True if the byte can be printed.

      • extractedStrings

        public static java.lang.String extractedStrings(byte[] buffer,
                                int beginIndex,
                                int endIndex)
        Searches for printable strings in a byte buffer of data.

        Six or more consecutive printable bytes will be show as a quoted string in the returned result.

        Parameters:
        buffer - The buffer to search for printable strings.
        beginIndex - The index of the first byte to start searching.
        endIndex - The index after the last byte to stop searching.
        Returns:
        a comma separated list of printable strings that was found in the buffer.

      • extractedStrings

        public static java.lang.String extractedStrings(byte[] buffer)
        Searches for printable strings in a byte buffer of data.

        Six or more consecutive printable bytes will be show as a quoted string in the returned result.

        Parameters:
        buffer - The buffer to search for printable strings.
        Returns:
        a comma separated list of printable strings that was found in the buffer.
